getContentAsHTML

java.lang.String getContentAsHTML()
Should be overriden by content types that can represent their content as HTML. Used for wcm:content tag (content rendering)

getContentAsText

java.lang.String getContentAsText()
Must be overriden by content types that can represent their content as text. Used for search results and versioning

java.lang.String getHardDependencies()
Return list of content dependency URIs comma-delimited, that must always apply to this node based on its current state
